data.1: WHEN THE SKY is split asunder,
data.3: When the oceans begin to flow,
data.5: Each soul will know what it had sent ahead and what it had left behind.
data.6: O man, what seduced you from your munificent Lord
data.7: Who created you then formed your symmetry, then gave you right proportion,
data.8: Shaping you into any form He pleased?
data.9: Even then you deny the Judgement.
data.10: Surely there are guardians over you,
data.13: The pious will surely be in heaven,
data.15: They will burn in it on the Day of Judgement,
data.16: And will not be removed from it.
data.17: How can you comprehend what the Day of Judgement is?
data.18: How then can you comprehend what the Day of Judgement is?
data.19: It is the day when no soul will have power to do the least for a soul, and God´s alone will be done.
